name: Survive the Monsters (Rad Chad (Derek))
description:
Allesandro Romano, owner of Romano's Pizza, has found himself in an unfortunate situation once again! Monsters are coming to attack him, and he needs to build defenses to stop them! Fight off waves of monsters and protect yourself with walls, turrets, and a trusty gun you got from a friend of yours.

Made by Derek Reynolds for Mini Jam 101!
